thread.title: Bullseye Communications Launches Rebrand Identity
thread.title_full: Bullseye Communications Launches Rebrand Identity - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bullseye Communications Launches Rebrand Identity
text:
Unveils new website, logo and social platform design
(PRWEB) October 22, 2015
Washington, D.C.-based Bullseye Communications partnered with New York metro area-based Hanabee Creative to design distinctive positioning and branding throughout its touchpoints with clients and colleagues.
The progressive visual identity and branding scheme capture the PR agency’s extensive work in the entertainment, sports and television industries. The spotlight is on client feedback, an element that truly separates the firm from its competition, with its many five-star reviews.
“Hanabee Creative did a phenomenal job of reflecting the look and feel of our business in their creative materials, style guide and website redesign,” said Karen Hansen, President of Bullseye Communications. “They conceptualized branding that easily communicates our full range of capabilities.”
The new brand soft launched last week at http://www.bullseyecomm.com and has now officially rolled out across the PR agency’s portfolio of digital and social channels.
"After working closely with Bullseye Communications, we are proud of our design to visually represent their expansive media relationships, highlight their accomplishments and positive presence," said Brigette Kierulf, Marketing Manager for Hanabee Creative. "We committed to building the right brand that speaks to their incredible work and professionalism."
About Hanabee Creative
Hanabee Creative is a full service business branding and marketing company. With a team of creative thinkers, graphic designers, and wordsmiths, they offer brand development, marketing management, graphic design, strategic promotions, web design and development. More about Hanabee Creative at http://www.hanabeecreative.com/
About Bullseye Communications
Bullseye Communications is a full service Public Relations agency offering traditional and digital media relations, talent relations, event management, press material creation, media junkets, media training and messaging, and social media management. The company is rooted in the philosophy of serving a direct extension of internal teams and partnering on priorities while offering targeted public relations campaigns. The team has representation across the industry in organizations such as Entertainment Publicist Professional Society (EPPS), National Academy of Television Arts & Sciences (NATAS), Women in Cable and Telecommunications, Inc. (WICT) and Television Publicity Executives Committee (TPEC). More about Bullseye Communications at http://www.bullseyecomm.com
